snippet.title: TerrorMania Official Launch Trailer PEGI
snippet.description:
In the second expansion you’ll explore the twisted and cursed alternate reality of the wasteland, the Deadlands. Reverse the curse before the skeletal forces of darkness can break free and take over the land of the living. Sounds easy enough?

Arm yourself with a brand-new weapon – a powerful sword that’s also the key to unlocking the gates between realities – and face off against a legion of skeletal enemies.

TerrorMania introduces:

New Weapon: Sword of Transitus – An ancient relic of unspeakable power.

New Location: The Deadlands – Explore an alternate reality version of the wasteland. Once you complete the DLC story, you’ll be able to return to each location in the Deadlands and experience them again.

New Enemy: Army of the Dead – Face off against the undead versions of familiar factions like the Goon Squad, Immortal Shrouded, River Hogs and Abadon Muties.
